Text: Great quality again, just like season 1, thanks allot!
Seed plz, i'm only getting 7kb/s and 75% done, plz seed!

The subtitles are weird,
-as in-  the new subtitle appears before the old one disappears, which is confusing because you never know in which order to read the subtitles, as they might appear above or below the old one.
this subtitle problem only applies to the first episode
